If you are setting up crawling machines for a large audince (non-root
users) you can configure 
limits in /etc/security/limits.conf. For example you can setup open
files limit for all users in 
webcrawler group as:

Hey!  That's pretty useful to know.   I never realized that was
configurable that way.  Thanks!
-Andy
